---

---

# Extensions

The main extensions module provides access to third-party integrations and specialized functionality.

*Documentation for specific functions in this module will be automatically generated from the codebase.*

## Usage

```python
import pixeltable as pxt

# Access the extensions module directly
pxt.ext.<function_name>(...)
```

## Available Submodules

See the sidebar for a complete list of available extension modules.
